said. Android surpassed Symbian to become the world's No. 1 smart phone software in the fourth quarter of last year, according to the Canalys research firm. Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer said the partnership would give the team more innovation, greater global reach and scale. "We need to, and we will, collaborate closely on development... so we can really align and drive the future revolution of the mobile phone," he said. The key challenge will be to come

BGC Partners analyst Colin Gillis said that Google experienced tremendous growth under Eric Schmidt , becoming a search and advertising powerhouse, although the company also arguably experienced a number of missteps and missed opportunities. A case can also be made that the company has not built any new material revenue streams, was late to building for the mobile market, has no effective social solutions, overbuilt its headcount and placed itself in the crosshairs of government regulators, Gillis said. Editor-in-chief of technology blog SearchEngineLand.com Danny Sullivan said Google's biggest challenges now are to "prove that they've got their Mojo back and that nobody needs to fear them."

Nations community and are particularly thankful to Mr. Amir Dossal for accepting our invitation to serve as Special Envoy to the Summit," said Dan Doyle, the Founder and Executive Director of the World Youth Peace Summit. The World Youth Peace Summit brings scholar-athletes and scholar-artists from all over the world to Connecticut, so it truly is a natural partnership and we are thrilled to have the opportunity to incorporate the mission of the United Nations with the Summit's goals of promoting peace through athletics and the arts. Nobel Laureate and former United States Vice President Colin Powell and acclaimed author of Three Cups of Tea, Greg Mortenson , will speak at the World Youth Peace Summit, which comes to Connecticut in June and July,

remember Mike Pence as someone who, even then, wore his heart on his sleeve," Bill Stephan said.
